titles.title: Safer Roads Everywhere Act
To authorize the Secretary of Transportation to conduct activities to improve worldwide traffic safety, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Highways, Transit and Pipelines.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

bill.summary: 3/12/2003--Introduced. Safer Roads Everywhere Act - Amends Federal highway law to authorize the Secretary of Transportation, in exercising his or her authority to increase highway safety, to improve through specified traffic safety-related activities worldwide traffic safety and reduce the burden of deaths and injuries from traffic accidents.
